createindex.name: CreateIndex
createindex.description: Grants permission to create a new vector index within a specified vector bucket

createvectorbucket.name: CreateVectorBucket
createvectorbucket.description: Grants permission to create a new vector bucket

deleteindex.name: DeleteIndex
deleteindex.description: Grants permission to delete a specified vector index

deletevectorbucket.name: DeleteVectorBucket
deletevectorbucket.description: Grants permission to delete a specified vector bucket

deletevectorbucketpolicy.name: DeleteVectorBucketPolicy
deletevectorbucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the IAM resource policy from a specified vector bucket

deletevectors.name: DeleteVectors
deletevectors.description: Grants permission to delete a batch of vectors from a specified vector index

getindex.name: GetIndex
getindex.description: Grants permission to get the attributes of a specified vector index

getvectorbucket.name: GetVectorBucket
getvectorbucket.description: Grants permission to get the attributes of a specified vector bucket

getvectorbucketpolicy.name: GetVectorBucketPolicy
getvectorbucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to get the IAM resource policy for a specific vector bucket

getvectors.name: GetVectors
getvectors.description: Grants permission to get a batch of vectors by their vector keys

listindexes.name: ListIndexes
listindexes.description: Grants permission to get a paginated list of all indexes in a specified vector bucket

listvectorbuckets.name: ListVectorBuckets
listvectorbuckets.description: Grants permission to get a paginated list of all vector buckets in the account

listvectors.name: ListVectors
listvectors.description: Grants permission to get a paginated list of all vectors in a specified vector index

putvectorbucketpolicy.name: PutVectorBucketPolicy
putvectorbucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to add an IAM resource policy to a specified vector bucket

putvectors.name: PutVectors
putvectors.description: Grants permission to add a batch of vectors to a specified vector index

queryvectors.name: QueryVectors
queryvectors.description: Grants permission to find approximate nearest neighbors within a specified search vector index for a given query vector
